thread.title: Heather Gothard

author: Heather Gothard
title: Heather Gothard
text: I downloaded Adguard and had a problem. It wasn't getting rid of ads. I emailed customer support and expected to wait a week or so and then get a response that was less than useful, as this has been my previous experience with many other software companies. Boy, was I surprised, and pleasantly so! I got an almost immediate reply, which told me to change a setting, and also provided me with a website which accurately and clearly explained what to do. The settings change fixed the issue and now it works perfectly. I am delighted with the program, which does what it says, and also with Adguard's customer support, which is stellar!
